oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fire razes handsome Belle Meade home, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about a fire that gutted a home on Lynwood Boulevard. The caption reads: “Fire which broke out shortly after noon today gutted the home of J. A. Hawkinson on Lynwood Boulevard. Apparently starting in the attic of the home, the fire swept over the entire structure, destroying all furniture except on the first floor. The home was almost a total loss. The Belle Meade Fire Department and City Fire Company No. 17 answered the call.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hawkinson, J. A.
